TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit Rect3D extends System.ValueType implements class System.IFormattable

summary.span: 表示 3-D 矩形： 例如，cube。

span.span: Represents a 3-D rectangle: for example, a cube.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義為某個位置 () 和一個 size 結構 ()。 is defined as a location () and a size structure (). 因為， ，和指定大小的值範圍和非座標，它們不能是負數除了在空的矩形的情況下。Because the , , and values specified for the size are magnitudes and not coordinates, they cannot be negative except in the case of an empty rectangle. 所指定的空矩形，其中包含， ，和-無限大的值。An empty rectangle is specified by , which has , , and values of -Infinity. 此結構通常用來代表 meze或。This structure is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 和不通常會以 XAML，因為沒有可設定的屬性存在於使用這些類型的 WPF 3D 物件模型。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回空其 X、 Y 和 Z 值為正無限大，其大小值為負無限大方向。This property returns an empty whose X, Y, and Z values are positive-infinity and whose size values are negative infinity. 這是唯一的大小值可以是負數的情況。This is the only situation in which size values can be negative. 通常用來代表 meze或。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or .

summary.span: 取得或設定表示的原點。

span.span: Gets or sets a that represents the origin of the .

value.span: 代表的原始，通常是後面左下的角。

span.span: that represents the origin of the , typically the back bottom left corner.
The default value is (0,0,0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意，在 3d 座標系統中，正 Y 軸朝 (假設此相機屬性為正值)。Note that in the 3-D coordinate system, the positive Y axis points up (assuming that the camera's property is positive). 因此，這個屬性通常代表後面左下的角的場景中。Therefore, this property usually represents the back bottom left corner of the in the scene. 通常用來代表 meze或。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 和不通常會以 XAML，因為沒有可設定的屬性存在於使用這些類型的 WPF 3D 物件模型。 and are not typically used in XAML, because no settable properties exist in the WPF 3D object model that use those types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常用來代表 meze或。 is typically used to represent the bounds of a or . 請注意，呼叫方法只會有影響，如果您可以變更， ，和直接內容。Note that calling the method will only have an effect if you can change the , , and properties directly. 因為是實值類型，如果您參考物件所使用的屬性或索引子，您會取得一份物件，而不是物件的參考。Because is a value type, if you reference a object by using a property or indexer, you get a copy of the object, not a reference to the object. 如果您嘗試變更， ，或上的屬性或索引子的參考，則編譯器會發生錯誤。If you attempt to change , , or on a property or indexer reference, a compiler error occurs. 同樣地，呼叫屬性或索引子上不會變更基礎物件。Similarly, calling on the property or indexer will not change the underlying object. 如果您想要變更的值參照為屬性或索引子，會建立新，修改其欄位，然後指派回到屬性或索引子。If you want to change the value of a that is referenced as a property or indexer, create a new , modify its fields, and then assign the back to the property or indexer.
